issue.title: [C++] CMake ignores ARROW_PARQUET
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6291](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6291). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Passing `-DARROW_PARQUET=off` is ignored and Parquet is always built. It shouldn't.
